#summary This page explains how to build the documentation, the sources and a package of Cherry on Ext
#labels Phase-Design


*NB*: The build scripts only work on Windows since they use JSBuilder.

=Sources=
  # Install JSBuilder in "C:\Program Files\JS Builder" (download from http://www.jackslocum.com/build/download.php?dl=jsb)
  # If JSBuilder is installed in a different directory, update the variable JSBUILDER_BASE_DIR into file build.bat
  # Launch build.bat

=Documentation=
  # Extracting archive jsdoc_toolkit (http://jsdoc-toolkit.googlecode.com/files/jsdoc_toolkit-1.4.0.zip or newer)
  # Make sure you have a JRE installed and configured in the path (eg by typing java from the command line)
  # Edit "generaDoc.bat"  and change the value of JSDOC_BASE_DIR to the directory where you extracted jsdoc toolkit  
  # Launch generaDoc.bat

=Package=
  # Ensure that you are able to generate the documentation following the instructions.
  # Ensure that you are able to build the sources following the instructions.
  # Download InfoZip's zip.exe (ftp://ftp.info-zip.org/pub/infozip/win32/) and install it in C:\Program Files\InfoZip
  # If InfoZip is installed in a different directory, update the variable ZIP_BASE_DIR into generaDoc.bat
  # Launch build_all.bat
